answers.answer: Most women get induced because of bp or low fluid or if baby measure big diabetes etc. Its alot of different reasons.
I will be induced tomorrow bc of high blood pressure. I will be 39w2d... but thr are so many reasons why! U could be induced for running to high of a fever if they cant get it lowered in time.
When I was pregnant with my daughter I had to be induced because my water broke and I wasn't progressing at all.
If I have to be induced it will be because I'm carrying extra fluid and the doctor said if the baby starts to get stressed out they will induce me.

Already scheduled to be induced at 39 weeks...no problems exept that I am already 6-7cm dilated and am strep b positive...doc wants me to deliver in a controlled environment that way I can get the antibiotics needed...also so I don't deliver in the car on the way to the hospital.
I'm being induced tomorrow at 38w4d because my last baby was very quick and was born in the car and by no means do I want to experiance that ever again!
I'm being induced on the 18th just because she is super healthy and the doc says she can come a week early :)

question: Hey girls, so what are all reasons you might get induced? This is my 1st pregnancy and baby girl is extremely low. My cervix is closed but dr says she can feel baby's head down there. Currently 35 weeks and 1 day (: TIA
title: Q on being induced
